description: Override preset to control reviewers requested on Renovate PRs. Accepts up to five optional
reviewers via preset arguments: {{arg0}}, {{arg1}}, {{arg2}}, {{arg3}}, and {{arg4}}. Each
argument may be a single user (e.g., 'octocat') or a team using the 'team:' prefix
- Reviewers are requested at PR creation time and are not modified afterward
- When assigning a team, use the 'team:' prefix and only the last part of the team name
